Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

I'm experiencing the following problem since the last patch has been installed (not experiencing for sure before Making History). 

The landing struts keep exploding even at very small velocity, in conditions they were working just fine in the past. They explode landing on the Mun or even on the launching pad. Anyone having the same issue?

 

I've the Making History dlc installed and the custom Kerbal Engineer Redux installed (https://github.com/jrbudda/KerbalEngineer/releases).

 

Thanks for your help!

6 hours ago, Thanatos84 said:

Hi everyone!

I'm experiencing the following problem since the last patch has been installed (not experiencing for sure before Making History). 

The landing struts keep exploding even at very small velocity, in conditions they were working just fine in the past. They explode landing on the Mun or even on the launching pad. Anyone having the same issue?

 

I've the Making History dlc installed and the custom Kerbal Engineer Redux installed (https://github.com/jrbudda/KerbalEngineer/releases).

 

Thanks for your help!

Already reported by a number of us since the 1.4.2 patch. There's a bug report on the Squad Bug Tracker and the issue is marked as "Investigating." So Squad has confirmed it and trying to get a handle on it, presumably. Wouldn't hurt to post your screenshots/.craft files/logs there.
